heading: HR00868
0:
RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES
THAT THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT PRIORITIZE THE FUNDING OF ECONOMIC RECOVERY, HEALTH MEASURES TO PROTECT THE PEOPLE FROM COVID-19, AND SOCIAL SERVICES PROGRAMS INSTEAD OF PUSHING THROUGH WITH THE DEAL TO PURCHASE ATTACK HELICOPTERS AND OTHER MILITARY EQUIPMENT IN THE MIDST OF THE PANDEMIC
principal-authors: BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C.; GAITE, FERDINAND R.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00868
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES THAT THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT PRIORITIZE THE FUNDING OF ECONOMIC RECOVERY, HEALTH MEASURES TO PROTECT THE PEOPLE FROM COVID-19, AND SOCIAL SERVICES PROGRAMS INSTEAD OF PUSHING THROUGH WITH THE DEAL TO PURCHASE ATTACK HELICOPTERS AND OTHER MILITARY EQUIPMENT IN THE MIDST OF THE PANDEMIC
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BROSAS, ARLENE D., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C., GAITE, FERDINAND R., CASTRO, FRANCE L., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2020-05-14
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE ON 2020-05-18
